LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByCorpses.label: pyrolyzing corpses (360)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByCorpses.description: pyrolyzing 360 kilograms of corpses(about 6 human) and extract into 150 chemfuel. corpses must be biological.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunks.label: pyrolyzing junk (4)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunks.description: pyrolyzing 4 kilograms of organical junk and extract into 7 chemfuel. junk must be made of non-smeltable and burnable material.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunksPlus.label: pyrolyzing junk (28)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractChemFuelByJunksPlus.descriptio: pyrolyzing 28 kilograms of organical junk and extract into 35 chemfuel. junk must be made of non-smeltable and burnable material.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunks.label: recycling junk (8)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunks.description: smelting 8 kilograms of junk and extract back into the material. junk must be made of smeltable material.
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunksPlus.label: recycling junk (32)
LanguageData.FT_ExtractSteelByJunksPlus.description: smelting 32 kilograms of junk and extract back into the material. junk must be made of smeltable material.
LanguageData.FTC_KitchenCookMealSimple.label: cook simple meal x8
LanguageData.FTC_KitchenCookMealSimple.description: Cook 8 straightforward meal from one ingredient.
